nfo.data

Class ProfileCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.data.ProfileCreator

  • public abstract class ProfileCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Profile manipulator, creates nfo from a template ( profile ) and a content
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static java.lang.String create(Profile profile,
                      java.lang.String[] content)
        Create a nfo from a profile, the content is still in the profile.
        Parameters:
        profile - Profile used as a template
        content - Array of String to use as content of the nfo, if null the attribute of the Profile is used.
        Returns:
        String containing the whole nfo

      • determineLongestLine

        protected static int determineLongestLine(java.lang.String[] rows)
        Determine the longest line in an array of string.
        Parameters:
        rows - Array of string.
        Returns:
        Number of character in the longest line.

      • trimLongLine

        protected static java.lang.String[] trimLongLine(java.lang.String[] rows,
                              int maxLength)
        Reduce the line longer than a specific length, split the line in a smaller one and place the rest as the following line.
        Parameters:
        rows - Array of string to check.
        maxLength - Length of the line to use.
        Returns:
        An array of string shorter than the specific length.

      • appendSpaces

        protected static java.lang.String appendSpaces(java.lang.String string,
                            int number)
        Append spaces at the end of a string.
        Parameters:
        string - String to add spaces.
        number - Number of spaces to add.
        Returns:
        The new formed String.

      • appendLines

        protected static java.lang.String[] appendLines(java.lang.String[] rows,
                             int number)
        Append empty lines at the end of a String array.
        Parameters:
        rows - Array of String
        number - Number of empty lines to append.
        Returns:
        New array with a certain number of empty lines at the end.
